div.p: I TOLD HER TO LISTEN TO THE FACTOR AND NOT OTHERS, BY THE
WAY, "KILLING JESUS" WAS THE BEST BOOK I EVER READ.
AND AS YOU KNOW, WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO STAY CLOSE TO THE FACTOR
BECAUSE IT CAN PAY OFF BIG TIME. >> LINCOLN, FOR 600, PLEASE.
>> BILLY CAMPBELL PLAYED THE BIG MAN IN A 2013 TV ADAPTATION OF
THIS BILL O’REILLY BOOK. >> WHAT IS KILLING LINCOLN?
>> THAT IS THE BOOK. >> SO THAT GUY WON 18,000 BUCKS,
PARTIALLY BECAUSE HE IS A FACTOR GUY, RIGHT?
TIP OF THE DAY, BE A FACTOR GUY OR GAL.
IT WILL PAY OFF, MAYBE NOT 18 GRAND, BUT SOMEHOW.
THAT IS IT FOR US, PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS
DIFFERENT FROM BILLO’REILLY.COM. WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF
